trans-unit.source: Submit
trans-unit.target: Submit

trans-unit.source: Event type
trans-unit.target: Event type

trans-unit.source: Next page
trans-unit.target: Next page

trans-unit.source: Please choose an event type
trans-unit.target: Please choose an event type

trans-unit.source: You must first select an event type so that the corresponding input fields can be displayed on the following pages.
trans-unit.target: You must first select an event type so that the corresponding input fields can be displayed on the following pages.

trans-unit.source: Single event
trans-unit.target: Single event

trans-unit.source: Multiday event
trans-unit.target: Multiday event

trans-unit.source: Recurring event
trans-unit.target: Recurring event

trans-unit.source: Event data
trans-unit.target: Event data

trans-unit.source: Previous page
trans-unit.target: Previous page

trans-unit.source: Next page
trans-unit.target: Next page

trans-unit.source: Title
trans-unit.target: Title

trans-unit.source: The title is a mandatory field. It should identify the event as clearly as possible.
trans-unit.target: The title is a mandatory field. It should identify the event as clearly as possible.

trans-unit.source: Event begin
trans-unit.target: Event begin

trans-unit.source: The start date is a mandatory field. Click on the calendar icon to open the Date Value Wizard.
trans-unit.target: The start date is a mandatory field. Click on the calendar icon to open the Date Value Wizard.

trans-unit.source: Event end
trans-unit.target: Event end

trans-unit.source: For multiday events, the event end date is a mandatory field. Click on the calendar icon to open the Date Value Wizard.
trans-unit.target: For multiday events, the event end date is a mandatory field. Click on the calendar icon to open the Date Value Wizard.

trans-unit.source: End of the series of events
trans-unit.target: End of the series of events

trans-unit.source: For recurring events we recommend setting an end date. However, this is not mandatory. Click on the calendar icon to open the Date Value Wizard.
trans-unit.target: For recurring events we recommend setting an end date. However, this is not mandatory. Click on the calendar icon to open the Date Value Wizard.

trans-unit.source: Event time
trans-unit.target: Event time

trans-unit.source: Here you can add a start time to the event. Use the format hh:mm. If it is a recurring event, this time will be valid for every day.
trans-unit.target: Here you can add a start time to the event. Use the format hh:mm. If it is a recurring event, this time will be valid for every day.

trans-unit.source: Teaser
trans-unit.target: Teaser

trans-unit.source: Enter a short description here. This will be used as description text in event overviews.
trans-unit.target: Enter a short description here. This will be used as description text in event overviews.

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Enter a detailed description here. This will be displayed as description text in the detail view.
trans-unit.target: Enter a detailed description here. This will be displayed as description text in the detail view.

trans-unit.source: Ticket link
trans-unit.target: Ticket link

trans-unit.source: Enter a link to the ticket sale here. Please transfer the complete link incl. https://
trans-unit.target: Enter a link to the ticket sale here. Please transfer the complete link incl. https://

trans-unit.source: Event Location
trans-unit.target: Event Location

trans-unit.source: The venue is a required field. Please enter the first times of the location in the field and select the appropriate location from the list.
trans-unit.target: The venue is a required field. Please enter the first times of the location in the field and select the appropriate location from the list.

trans-unit.source: Download link
trans-unit.target: Download link

trans-unit.source: Here you can add a link to a program booklet, for example.
trans-unit.target: Here you can add a link to a program booklet, for example.

trans-unit.source: YouTube link
trans-unit.target: YouTube link

trans-unit.source: Here you can add a link to a YouTube video.
trans-unit.target: Here you can add a link to a YouTube video.

trans-unit.source: Categories
trans-unit.target: Categories

trans-unit.source: Categories are a required field. Select min. 1 but max. 3 categories.
trans-unit.target: Categories are a required field. Select min. 1 but max. 3 categories.

trans-unit.source: Weekday
trans-unit.target: Weekday

trans-unit.source: The days of the week are a required field. Select at least one day of the week. The event will then appear every week on the specified weekdays.
trans-unit.target: The days of the week are a required field. Select at least one day of the week. The event will then appear every week on the specified weekdays.

trans-unit.source: Monday
trans-unit.target: Monday

trans-unit.source: Tuesday
trans-unit.target: Tuesday

trans-unit.source: Wednesday
trans-unit.target: Wednesday

trans-unit.source: Thursday
trans-unit.target: Thursday

trans-unit.source: Friday
trans-unit.target: Friday

trans-unit.source: Saturday
trans-unit.target: Saturday

trans-unit.source: Sunday
trans-unit.target: Sunday

trans-unit.source: 1st image upload
trans-unit.target: 1st image upload

trans-unit.source: You can add up to 2 images to the event.
trans-unit.target: You can add up to 2 images to the event.

trans-unit.source: 2nd image upload
trans-unit.target: 2nd image upload

trans-unit.source: You can add up to 2 images to the event.
trans-unit.target: You can add up to 2 images to the event.
